alert.note: Alert for Bee; Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 13 at 3:24AM CDT until April 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Expected This Afternoon... .Moderate to strong winds northwest to north winds between 16 to 24 mph with gusts from 25 to 30 mph will occur behind a front this afternoon from the Brush Country to the inland Coastal Bend. Critically low relative humidity values and extremely dry fuels will result in critical fire weather conditions for areas along and west of Baffin Bay to Beeville line this afternoon. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR THE INLAND COASTAL BEND... The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 7 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Bee...Inland Kleberg...Inland Nueces...Inland San Patricio Counties. * TIMING...From Noon to 7 PM CDT Wednesday * WIND...Northwest to north winds from 16 to 22 mph with gusts from 25 to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...From 15 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Residents are urged to exercise care with respect to all outdoor activities that could inadvertently cause wildfires. Report wildfires quickly to the nearest fire department or law enforcement office.
